name: Space Sailors
description:
Space sailors is a game made for the Nokia 3310 2023 Jam. You are a rocketship that is trying to save earth by exploding comets that are coming towards her but also get a big score. Note that the goal of this game mainly isn't to save earth, but to get a high score by controlling the amount of comments that will be coming towards earth.

Controls:

Space(Shoot), WASD(Move), F(Spawn comet), E(Change colour)
